attributes.action: Call MPs to resign if they continue to be sponsored or invest in oil and gas
attributes.additional_details:
Companies are the greatest culprits of pollution and waste products. Stop putting the onus on the public and start guiding companies to make big changes. If an MP is supporting a company that is not dramatically changing they should resign as their goals are obviously profit based.

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-45775309

https://www.theguardian.com/sustainable-business/2017/jul/10/100-fossil-fuel-companies-investors-responsible-71-global-emissions-cdp-study-climate-change
attributes.background: In the wake of the news that we are reaching the end of our ability to limit climate change the government needs to show they see this as a priority. There needs to be a stop to short term planning and focus on profits instead of seeking the long term benefits to the world.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it would be the decision of the individual MP to resign, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
